common.error_friendly: Something went wrong. Please check your connection and try again.
common.ai_limit_daily_desc: You have reached the daily limit of {{limit}} uses for this feature. Please come back tomorrow to continue.
common.ai_limit_weekly_desc: You have reached the weekly limit of {{limit}} uses for this feature. Please come back next week to continue.

guide.title: Smart Hydration Guide
guide.intro: Not all drinks hydrate the same way. Here’s a simple and practical overview:
guide.water_desc: Zero calories. Ideal for daily hydration. Recommended as your main drink.
guide.coffee_desc: Contains caffeine. Still contributes to hydration in moderation. Tip: Balance with water.
guide.tea_desc: Light caffeine content. Hydrates similarly to water. Unsweetened is best.
guide.milk_desc: Contains electrolytes and protein. Keeps you hydrated longer but watch the calories.
guide.juice_desc: Provides fluids but often high in sugar. Best diluted with water.
guide.soda_desc: High sugar and additives. Not ideal. Drink occasionally.
guide.tip_1: Drink water regularly, not only when thirsty
guide.tip_2: Start your day with a glass of water
guide.tip_3: Carry a water bottle during the day

connect_apps.title: Connect Apps
connect_apps.description: Sync your data with Health Connect to automatically import steps, weight, and active calories from Samsung Health, Google Fit, and other compatible apps.
connect_apps.connection_failed: Failed to connect. Please check permissions.
connect_apps.not_supported: Health Connect is not available on this device.
connect_apps.platform_not_supported: Health Connect is only available on Android devices.

auth.reset_password_desc: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
auth.reset_link_sent_desc: If an account exists with that email, you will receive instructions shortly.
auth.error_password_length: Password must be at least 6 characters.
auth.limit_reached_desc: You cannot create more accounts on this device.

signup_success.title: Almost there!
signup_success.subtitle: Confirm your email
signup_success.desc: We have sent a confirmation link to
signup_success.spam_hint: If you don't see it, check your Spam or Junk folder.

login.tagline: Your intelligent companion to eat better, move more, and reach your health goals without stress.
login.subtitle: Log in to continue your health journey.
login.create_account_subtitle: Start your health journey with us today.
login.terms_privacy: By continuing, you agree to our <1>Terms of Service</1> and <3>Privacy Policy</3>.

onboarding.toast_error: Error saving profile. Please try again.

gender.title: What is your gender?
gender.description: This helps us calculate your nutritional needs more accurately.

age.title: How old are you?
age.description: Age is a key factor in determining your basal metabolic rate (BMR).

experience.title: Have you used nutrition apps before?
experience.description: This helps us tailor the complexity of the app.
experience.first_time: No, this is my first time

metrics.title: Your current measurements
metrics.description: We need your current weight and height to calculate your BMI and goals.

motivation.title: What motivates you the most?
motivation.description: Knowing your motivation helps us keep you focused.
motivation.healthier: To be healthier and prevent diseases
motivation.energy: To have more energy throughout the day
motivation.feel_better: To feel better about myself and my body

goal.title: What is your main goal?
goal.description: We will calculate your daily calorie and macro needs based on this.

goal_weight.title: What is your goal weight?
goal_weight.description: We will track your progress towards this goal.
goal_weight.disclaimer: You can change this goal at any time in the settings.

weekly_rate.title: How fast do you want to achieve it?
weekly_rate.description: A safe and sustainable rate is recommended for long-term success.
weekly_rate.fast_desc: Fast rate. Requires high discipline and may be harder to sustain.
weekly_rate.slow_desc: Slow and steady rate. Highly sustainable and minimizes muscle loss.
weekly_rate.balanced_desc: Balanced rate. Effective and manageable for most people.

notifications.title: Stay Consistent
notifications.description: Turn on notifications to get reminders for meals, hydration, and weight checks. It helps you stay on track!
notifications.smart_reminders_desc: We'll send you tips and reminders every 3 hours (9am - 9pm) to keep you focused.

final.title: Ready to start?
final.description: Calorel uses AI to help you achieve your goals faster and more sustainably.

goal_projection.title: Goal Insight
goal_projection.desc: Based on your personalized plan, here is an estimation of when you'll reach your goal.
goal_projection.maintenance_desc: Your plan is designed to maintain your current weight and improve your overall health.

subscribe.title: Unlock Your Full Potential
subscribe.subtitle: Get all premium features to reach your goals faster.
subscribe.no_charge_text: No charge for 3 days. Cancel anytime.
subscribe.enable_trial_desc: Try it free before you pay

timeline.reminder_desc: We will send you a reminder before the trial ends.
timeline.billing_desc: If you don't cancel, the subscription will begin.

buttons.no_payment_note: No charge for the first 3 days.

subscription_success.desc_trial: You have unlimited access to all Premium features. Make the most of it!
subscription_success.subtitle_annual: You have activated the Annual Plan.
subscription_success.desc_annual: Thank you for committing to your long-term health. We are here to support you.
subscription_success.subtitle_monthly: You have activated the Monthly Plan.
subscription_success.desc_monthly: Thank you for trusting Calorel. Let's reach those goals together!

widgets.title: Widgets
widgets.step_1: Go to your phone's home screen.
widgets.step_2: Long press on an empty space.
widgets.step_4: Search for 'Calorel' and drag the widget.

diet_list.title: Premium Diets
diet_list.subtitle: Find the perfect eating style for your goals.

high_protein.name: High Protein
high_protein.short_desc: Boost protein intake to gain muscle and lose fat.
high_protein.description: A nutritional plan focused on increasing the proportion of protein within daily intake to promote muscle mass preservation, improve satiety, and support body fat reduction while maintaining an adequate caloric balance.
high_protein.objective: Prioritize protein consumption within a balanced diet without completely eliminating carbohydrates or fats.
high_protein.ideal_for_1: People looking to lose fat without losing muscle mass.
high_protein.ideal_for_2: Users who perform physical activity or strength training.
high_protein.ideal_for_3: People who want better appetite control.
high_protein.not_recommended_for_1: People with medical restrictions related to high protein diets.
high_protein.not_recommended_for_2: People following a strictly vegan diet.

keto.name: Keto Diet
keto.description: Drastically reduces carbohydrates and increases fat consumption so the body uses fat as the main energy source.
keto.objective: Induce a metabolic state that favors fat burning.
keto.ideal_for_2: People looking for quick results under control.
keto.not_recommended_for_1: People with liver or kidney issues.

vegetarian.name: Vegetarian Diet
vegetarian.short_desc: No meat, rich in vegetables and dairy.
vegetarian.description: Eliminates meat consumption but allows foods like eggs and dairy, basing the diet mainly on plant sources.
vegetarian.objective: Reduce meat consumption while maintaining balanced nutrition.
vegetarian.ideal_for_1: People who do not consume meat.
vegetarian.ideal_for_2: Users looking for a lighter and more sustainable diet.

mediterranean.name: Mediterranean Diet
mediterranean.description: Based on fresh foods, healthy fats, and low consumption of ultra-processed foods, with an emphasis on nutritional quality.
mediterranean.objective: Improve cardiovascular health and overall well-being in the long term.
mediterranean.ideal_for_1: People looking for a healthy and sustainable diet.
mediterranean.ideal_for_2: Users focused on prevention and general health.
